metadata.title: CVE-2023-0386 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel, where unauthorized access to theexecution of the setuid file with capabilities was found in the Linuxkernelâ€™s OverlayFS subsystem in how a user copies a capable file from anosuid mount into another mount. This uid mapping bug allows a local userto escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
